actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a program of providing information and education to the public on the prevention and treatment of eating disorders.
short_title: Eating Disorders Information and Education Act of 1997

summary.text: Eating Disorders Information and Education Act of 1997 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to provide for a program of information and public education concerning the prevention and treatment of eating disorders. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Eating Disorders Information and Education Act of 1997
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a program of providing information and education to the public on the prevention and treatment of eating disorders.
